summary:
BSA texture for Enderal optimized for small/medium config in 512x512.

Faster Loading, Lower crash, General improvement ingame. :)
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][color=#ff0000][size=6][center]DON'T FORGET TO DOWNLOAD AND INSTALL THE UPDATE AFTER TO HAVE DOWNLOAD AND INSTALL MAIN FILES ![/center][/size][/color]


- Update 1.5 OUT ! [/b]:[/u] Fixe blurry book's font.

[b][u]- Update 1.4 OUT ! :[/u][/b] Fixes water problem.

[u][b]- Version 2 for the optional file Special character OUT:[/b][/u][b] Size decrease by 33% without noticeable change in quality and visual. More performance, lesser vram consumption also.[/b]

[b][u]- Optimized textures Spécial character is OUT[/u]:[/b] Optimized textures for weapons, armors, clothes and character in 1024. Works alone or install after Enderal Optimized Textures. 

[u][b]- Optimized LOD textures OUT ! [/b]:[/u] Download in files section with main files.

Size before: 101 Mo
Size After: 41 Mo [img]https://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/smile.gif[/img]

[u]- Update 1.3:[/u] Fixes books and pillars.

[u][b]- Update 1.2:[/b][/u] Fixes one texture in Ark's Theater and lod Mountain.

[b][u]- Update 1.1[/u]:[/b] Fixes a problem with bad size of the paintings. :)


Hello,

I optimized the three BSA archive of texture for Enderal. textures are in 512x512 for small/medium config with 512Mo/1Go vram.

- EEN - Textures1.bsa : 1,44GO  ==> 400 MO
- EEN - Textures2.bsa : 1,75 GO ==> 598 MO
- EEN - Textures3.bsa : 866 MO  ==> 234 MO

Before: 3,87 Go
After: 1.17 Go :)

Faster loading time, lesser crash, better stability overall, lesser stutter.

I compromised between beauty and stability/performance. I hope that that will help certain people. :)

Optimization made with DDSOpt.

[b][u]INSTALLATION:[/u][/b]

Copy/Paste the files in the directory "DATA", make a backup of three files before. the folder "textures" is for loading screen and wallpaper main menu, no optimized else it's ugly, copy/paste in your Skyrim data folder also.

Optimized LOD textures is same. Copy/Paste in your Skyrim DATA folder, backup the file EEN - TexturesLOD.bsa before just in case.

Optional file "Optimized textures special characters in 1024"  is an enhanced version of Enderal Optimized Textures special for weapons, armor, clothes and character. Install alone for small performance gain (Original résolution of Enderal for character is 2048) or after Enderal Optimized Textures (512 version) for enhanced textures of characters.  For fashion character who likes the beautiful armors, small performance loss compared to Main file Enderal Optimized Textures but enhanced textures. :)

[b][u]UNINSTALLATION:

[/u][/b]Remove the three BSA files and the folder textures and put your backup files.
author: AzazelDC

files.name: Optimized textures special characters in 1024 VERSION 2.0
